mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team ( version, date_created, last_updated, logo, `name`, is_display )VALUES( 0, now(), now(), #{logo}, #{name}, #{isDisplay} )ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_updated=now(), logo=#{logo}, `name`=#{name}, is_display=#{isDisplay}

INSERT INTO team_data ( version, date_created, last_updated, region, contacts, industry, size, outer_id, phone_number, team_id, can_tel, introduction, `client` )VALUES( 0, now(), now(), #{region}, #{contacts}, #{industry}, #{size}, #{outerId}, #{phoneNumber}, #{teamId}, #{canTel}, #{introduction}, #{client} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_updated=now(), region=#{region}, industry=#{industry}, size=#{size}, introduction=#{introduction}

INSERT INTO team_user ( version, date_created, last_updated, team_id, who_can_invite_colleague, deleted_team_user )VALUES( 0, now(), now(), #{teamId}, #{whoCanInviteColleague}, #{deletedTeamUser} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_updated=now(), who_can_invite_colleague=#{whoCanInviteColleague}, deleted_team_user=#{deletedTeamUser}

INSERT INTO team_user_role ( version, date_created, last_updated, team_id, role, user_id )VALUES( 0, now(), now(), #{teamId}, #{role}, #{userId} )ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_updated=now(), role=#{role}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM team_user_role
WHERE team_id=#{teamId} AND user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO join_and_quit_team_record ( version, date_created, last_updated, user_id, team_id, type )VALUES( 0, now(), now(), #{userId}, #{teamId}, #{type} )
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM team_user_role
WHERE team_id=#{teamId} AND user_id=#{userId}
